Post Summary: Geoff Ralston, well-known in the startup community for his years at Y Combinator, is back in the formal investing ring, he announced Thursday.

Post Summary: Former Y Combinator president Geoff Ralston is making a targeted bet on AI safety with the launch of a new venture fund focused exclusively on startups working to make AI more secure, transparent, and aligned with human values.
